00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              TWO POLE LOWPASS FILTER
00004  *              based on Hal Chamberlin
00005  *******************************************************

00011 // Check against redundant including
00012 #ifndef TT_LOWPASS_TWOPOLE_H
00013 #define TT_LOWPASS_TWOPOLE_H
00014 
00015 // Include appropriate headers
00016 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_lowpass_twopole:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // int  sr;                                                                     *** Inherited: Holds local sample rate
00029                 tt_attribute_value              resonance;
00030                 tt_attribute_value              frequency;
00031                 double                                  coef_a, coef_b, coef_c;
00032                 double                                  feedback[2][2];         // First is vhannel, 2nd is x or y
00033                 double                                  radians, minus_one_over_resonance;
00034         
00035                 enum constants{
00036                         k_left = 0,
00037                         k_right = 1,
00038                 };
00039         
00040         public:
00041                 // void set_sr(int);                                            *** Inherited: Sets local sample rate
00042                 // int get_sr();                                                        *** Inherited: Retrieves local sample rate
00043                 // void set_global_sr(int);                                     *** Inherited: Sets global sample rate
00044                 // int get_global_sr();                                         *** Inherited: Retrieves global sample rate
00045 
00046                 enum selectors{                                                         
00047                         num_poles = 2,
00048                         
00049                         k_resonance,                                                    // Attribute Selectors
00050                         k_frequency
00051                 };
00052                 
00053 
00054                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00055                 tt_lowpass_twopole()                                                            // Constructor          
00056                 {
00057                         set_attr(k_frequency, 1000.0);  
00058                         set_attr(k_resonance, 1.0);     
00059                         clear();
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 ~tt_lowpass_twopole()                                                           // Destructor
00063                 {
00064                         ;
00065                 }
00066 
00067 
00068                 // ATTRIBUTES
00069                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00070                 {
00071                         switch (sel){                   
00072                                 case k_frequency:
00073                                         frequency = val;
00074                                         radians = hertz_to_radians(val);
00075                                         break;
00076                                 case k_resonance:
00077                                         resonance = val;
00078                                         if (val <= 0.001) minus_one_over_resonance = -1000.;
00079                                         else minus_one_over_resonance = -1.0 / resonance;                                       
00080                                         break;
00081                         }
00082                         coef_a = 2.0 * cos(radians) * exp(0.5 * radians * minus_one_over_resonance);
00083                         coef_b = exp(radians * minus_one_over_resonance);
00084                         coef_c = 1.0 - coef_a + coef_b;                 
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00088                 {
00089                         switch (sel){
00090                                 case k_frequency:
00091                                         return frequency;
00092                                 case k_resonance:
00093                                         return resonance;
00094                                 default:
00095                                         return 0.0;
00096                         }
00097                 }
00098                 
00099                 
00100                 // DSP LOOP
00101                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00102                 {
00103                         tt_sample_value temp;
00104                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00105                         
00106                         while(temp_vs--){
00107                                 temp = *in->vector++;
00108                                 temp = anti_denormal((feedback[k_left][0] * coef_a) - (feedback[k_left][1] * coef_b) + (temp * coef_c));
00109                                 *out->vector++ = temp;
00110                                 feedback[k_left][1] = feedback[k_left][0];
00111                                 feedback[k_left][0] = temp;
00112 /*                              temp = *in->vector++;
00113                                 temp = (feedback[0] * coef_a) - (feedback[1] * coef_b) + (temp * coef_c);
00114                                 *out->vector++ = temp;
00115                                 feedback[1] = feedback[0];
00116                                 feedback[0] = temp;
00117 */                      }
00118                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 // DSP LOOP - STEREO
00122                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00123                 {
00124                         tt_sample_value temp[2];
00125                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00126                         
00127                         while(temp_vs--){
00128                                 // LEFT
00129                                 temp[k_left] = *in1->vector++;
00130                                 temp[k_left] = anti_denormal((feedback[k_left][0] * coef_a) - (feedback[k_left][1] * coef_b) + (temp[k_left] * coef_c));
00131                                 *out1->vector++ = temp[k_left];
00132                                 feedback[k_left][1] = feedback[k_left][0];
00133                                 feedback[k_left][0] = temp[k_left];
00134                                 
00135                                 // RIGHT
00136                                 temp[k_right] = *in2->vector++;
00137                                 temp[k_right] = anti_denormal((feedback[k_right][0] * coef_a) - (feedback[k_right][1] * coef_b) + (temp[k_right] * coef_c));
00138                                 *out2->vector++ = temp[k_right];
00139                                 feedback[k_right][1] = feedback[k_right][0];
00140                                 feedback[k_right][0] = temp[k_right];                           
00141                         }
00142                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00143                 }
00144 
00145         
00146 
00147                 // clear
00148                 void clear()
00149                 {
00150                         short i;
00151                         
00152                         for(i=0; i < num_poles; i++){
00153                                 feedback[k_left][i] = 0.0;
00154                                 feedback[k_right][i] = 0.0;
00155                         }       
00156                 }
00157                 
00158 };
00159 
00160 
00161 #endif  // TT_LOWPASS_TWOPOLE_H
